document_data.mainbody:
holan the Beautiful was a ranger who once paramour a coven of witches but later earned their scorn by marrying another.
Sometime before 1372 DR, Tholan the Beautiful found himself a lover of a witch coven known as Newts Brood. Being a ranger with endless wanderlust, he often traveled far away from his lovers and stayed away for long periods of time. To keep an eye on him, the Newts Brood created a suit of enchanted chainmail for the man, the Zeals Walk. Eventually, Tholan met another woman and, soon after, married her. To avoid his ex-lovers retribution, Tholan disposed of the magic armor. The happy couples final fate remained unknown.
